cell_name.title: CellName appends the WebSphere cell identifier label to every exported time-series.

cluster_name.title: ClusterName appends the WebSphere cluster identifier label to every exported time-series.

collect_apps_matching.title: CollectAppsMatching filters Web applications by name using glob patterns (supports `*`, `?`, `!` prefixes).

collect_cluster_metrics.title: CollectClusterMetrics toggles cluster-level health metrics; defaults to enabled when unset.

collect_ejb_metrics.title: CollectEJBMetrics enables Enterprise Java Bean workload metrics; defaults to enabled when unset.

collect_ejbs_matching.title: CollectEJBsMatching filters Enterprise Java Beans by name using glob patterns (supports `*`, `?`, `!` prefixes).

collect_jca_metrics.title: CollectJCAMetrics toggles JCA resource-adapter metrics; defaults to enabled when unset.

collect_jdbc_advanced.title: CollectJDBCAdvanced enables additional JDBC latency/timing statistics; defaults to disabled when unset.

collect_jdbc_metrics.title: CollectJDBCMetrics toggles JDBC connection-pool metrics; defaults to enabled when unset.

collect_jms_matching.title: CollectJMSMatching filters JMS destinations by name using glob patterns (supports `*`, `?`, `!` prefixes).

collect_jms_metrics.title: CollectJMSMetrics toggles JMS destination metrics; defaults to enabled when unset.

collect_jvm_metrics.title: CollectJVMMetrics toggles JVM runtime metrics; defaults to enabled when unset.

collect_pools_matching.title: CollectPoolsMatching filters JDBC and JCA pools by name using glob patterns (supports `*`, `?`, `!` prefixes).

collect_servlet_metrics.title: CollectServletMetrics enables servlet response-time metrics; defaults to enabled when unset (may add high-cardinality charts).

collect_servlets_matching.title: CollectServletsMatching filters servlet contexts by name using glob patterns (supports `*`, `?`, `!` prefixes).

collect_session_metrics.title: CollectSessionMetrics toggles HTTP session manager metrics; defaults to enabled when unset.

collect_threadpool_metrics.title: CollectThreadPoolMetrics toggles thread-pool metrics; defaults to enabled when unset.

collect_transaction_metrics.title: CollectTransactionMetrics toggles transaction manager metrics; defaults to enabled when unset.

collect_webapp_metrics.title: CollectWebAppMetrics toggles Web application metrics (includes servlet/session data); defaults to enabled when unset.

max_applications.title: MaxApplications caps the number of web applications charted (0 disables the limit).

max_ejbs.title: MaxEJBs caps the number of Enterprise Java Beans charted (0 disables the limit).

max_jca_pools.title: MaxJCAPools caps the number of JCA resource adapters charted (0 disables the limit).

max_jdbc_pools.title: MaxJDBCPools caps the number of JDBC connection pools charted (0 disables the limit).

max_jms_destinations.title: MaxJMSDestinations caps the number of JMS destinations charted (0 disables the limit).

max_servlets.title: MaxServlets caps the number of servlet contexts charted when servlet collection is enabled (0 disables the limit).

max_threadpools.title: MaxThreadPools caps the number of thread pools charted per server (0 disables the limit).

node_name.title: NodeName appends the WebSphere node identifier label to every exported time-series.

pmi_refresh_rate.title: PMIRefreshRate overrides the global PMI servlet refresh interval in seconds when a value >0 is provided.

pmi_stats_type.title: PMIStatsType selects which PMI statistics tier to request (`basic`, `extended`, `all`, or `custom`).

server_type.title: ServerType records the WebSphere server type label (for example `app_server`, `dmgr`, `nodeagent`).

vnode.title: Vnode allows binding the collector to a virtual node.
